languages.text: "А нечего было недооценивать Лорд-капитана! "Новеньк{mf|ий|ая}" да "новеньк{mf|ий|ая}"... сам себя успокаивал, что бояться {mf|его|ее} не надо, вот и доуспокоился!"

"Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"
languages.original_text: "А нечего было недооценивать Лорд-капитана! "Новеньк{mf|ий|ая}" да "новеньк{mf|ий|ая}"... сам себя успокаивал, что бояться {mf|его|ее} не надо, вот и доуспокоился!"

traits.locale_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “谁让他低估了舰长大人，活该！他管咱们舰长大人叫‘新来的’，以为这样就可以放心，不用再担心舰长大人！他实在是太洋洋得意了！”
languages.original_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"

traits.locale_text: “谁让他低估了舰长大人，活该！他管咱们舰长大人叫‘新来的’，以为这样就可以放心，不用再担心舰长大人！他实在是太洋洋得意了！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ça lui apprendra à sous-estimer {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ! Il {mf|le|la} traitait comme {mf|un|une} novice pour se rassurer, et il s'est vautré dans sa complaisance ! »
languages.original_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça lui apprendra à sous-estimer {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ! Il {mf|le|la} traitait comme {mf|un|une} novice pour se rassurer, et il s'est vautré dans sa complaisance ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Se lo merece por subestimar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán! Le llamaba "novat{mf|o|a}" para asegurarse de que no tenía nada que temer, ¡y acabó confiándose!».
languages.original_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Se lo merece por subestimar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán! Le llamaba "novat{mf|o|a}" para asegurarse de que no tenía nada que temer, ¡y acabó confiándose!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンを甘く見た罰よ！”新たな血”って呼んでロード・キャプテンを恐るるに足らずと安心しようとしてたけど、自己満足だったわね！」
languages.original_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンを甘く見た罰よ！”新たな血”って呼んでロード・キャプテンを恐るるに足らずと安心しようとしてたけど、自己満足だったわね！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Geschieht ihm recht, dass er den Lord Captain unterschätzt hat! 'Neues Blut' hat er ihn genannt, hat versucht, sich selbst einzureden, dass er vom Lord Captain nichts zu befürchten hat, und er ist nachlässig geworden!"
languages.original_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"

traits.locale_text: "Geschieht ihm recht, dass er den Lord Captain unterschätzt hat! 'Neues Blut' hat er ihn genannt, hat versucht, sich selbst einzureden, dass er vom Lord Captain nichts zu befürchten hat, und er ist nachlässig geworden!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ı küçümserse böyle olur! 'Taze kan' demeyi biliyordu. Lord Kaptan'ın korkulacak biri olmadığına kendini ikna etmeye çalışıyordu, hâlinden de memnundu."
languages.original_text: "Serves him right for underestimating the Lord Captain! 'New blood' is what he called {mf|him|her}, trying to reassure himself that he had nothing to fear from the Lord Captain, and he got complacent!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan'ı küçümserse böyle olur! Ona 'taze kan' demeyi biliyordu. Lord Kaptan'ın korkulacak biri olmadığına kendini ikna etmeye çalışıyordu ve hâlinden memnundu."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
